alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne; Rawlins (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 5:00PM CDT until August 07 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL CHEYENNE...NORTHWESTERN THOMAS AND SOUTHERN RAWLINS COUNTIES IN NORTHWESTERN KANSAS... At 459 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near McDonald, or 15 miles west of Atwood, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotter 5 southeast of McDonald reported hail up to quarters in size. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... McDonald and Beardsley. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
